snippet.title: Sorry We're Closed - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Get a new look at gameplay and the surreal world of Sorry We're Closed in this trailer for the upcoming survival horror RPG. Sorry We're Closed will be available on PC on November 14, 2024. Sorry We're Closed is a nostalgic, single-player survival horror game with rich lore, deep characters and

multiple endings. Explore unsettling locations with fixed camera angles. Fight in first person with demonic weapons. Open your Third Eye to see between worlds, uncover secrets and solve puzzles.
